channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Inspirational Quote Rotator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Inspirational Quote Rotator

item.title: CVE-2021-24771|2024-08-03T19:42:17.001Z -- unknown -- inspirational%20quote%20rotator
item.description: The Inspirational Quote Rotator WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not sanitize and escape some of its quote fields when adding/editing a quote as admin, leading to Stored Cross-Site scripting issues when the quote is output in the "Quotes list" even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
